name: Ruffian
description: You fell into the fringes of society and ended up as a thug on the street, committing petty crimes for small amounts of money.

exploits.name: The filth!
exploits.description: You have developed an uncanny ability to detect the Watch. When attempting to sniff out a watchman or similar authority figure, you gain a +1d6 bonus.

exploits.name: Street tough
exploits.description: Life on the streets is tough. You gain a natural +2 SOAK.
